Title: Relates to including substances designated pursuant to the federal Analog Act and Controlled Substances Act within the definition of controlled substances
Summary: Relates to including substances designated pursuant to the federal Analog Act and Controlled Substances Act within the definition of controlled substances.
LawCode: Amd ยง3306, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to including substances designated pursuant to the federal Analog Act and Controlled Substances Act within the definition of controlled substances
